did.abstract: Stuart Wilcox was a resident of Saratoga Springs who began corresponding with service men and women from Saratoga Springs who were serving abroad to show his support for the troops.

accessrestrict.p: Items in this collection may be subject to Copyright Laws.

bioghist.p: The letters in this collection describe events in Saratoga Springs and the experiences of men and women in the military during the war with Iraq.
When the soldiers came home, a parade was held and service men were photographed removing their ribbons from the trees where they had been hung.

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of a scrapbook and files of letters, newspaper clippings, photographs and ephemera. An additional album of photographs from the parade and welcoming home celebrations was added in 2005.

userestrict.p: Items may only be used in the Saratoga Room.
